name: Gravity and Buoyancy
description:
Use mouse to jump | hold to jump higher | Jump maximal height to switch side

Press R to restart

Song used: CroVa  - Amethyst

Quick Short rushed game. made in 2 hour for Rigid Jam 15 with theme Underwater. I have no experience on making a rythm based game before, so sorry if the audio is getting out of sync.

Inspired by Geometry dash and a game that i forgot it's name
